mrvExtensions.name: VM0007 REDD+ Methodology Framework Extension
mrvExtensions.description: Methodology specific data attributes being tracked.

dataExtensions.name: Δ𝐶𝑊𝑃𝑏𝑖𝑜𝑚𝑎𝑠𝑠,𝑡
dataExtensions.value: Change in carbon stock in biomass carbon pools in the project scenario in year 𝑡 (t C y-1)

dataExtensions.name: Δ𝐶𝑊𝑃𝑤𝑜𝑜𝑑𝑦,𝑡
dataExtensions.value: Average annual change in carbon stock in woody biomass in the project scenario in the monitoring interval ending in year 𝑡 (t C y-1)
